name: Baggage & Garbage
description:
Baggage is coming, and you're in charge of sorting it. Send the safe and the dangerous bags to the correct conveyor belts and use a scanner when unsure. To do this you can create conveyor belts of your own, but be careful: once one is created ,it'll stay there until the next round! 

With various levels of difficulty, will you be able to get the perfect score in every level?
